sentence.Network_en: Chloroprene Rubber ( CR ) is an important variety among the synthetic rubber.
sentence.Network_cn: 氯丁橡胶 ( CR ) 是合成橡胶的重要品种之一.

sentence.Network_en: In the chloroprene rubber can be used as acid acceptor.
sentence.Network_cn: 在氯丁橡胶中可作为酸的接受体.

sentence.Network_en: The chloroprene rubber sheath is heat and oil resistant and flame retardant.
sentence.Network_cn: 氯丁橡胶混合物护套具有耐热、耐油和不延然性能.

through the analysis , the antiseptic technique of urea prilling towers mainly adopts glass flake and cationic chloroprene latex cement mortar lining technology . finally , some sa …通过分析，尿素造粒塔的防腐技术主要采用玻璃鳞片衬里技术和阳离子氯丁胶乳水泥砂浆衬里技术，最后提出了防腐的施工技术与安全建议。
